notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: S.H., J.J.Y., Z.L.Z. and Y.P.Z. contributed to the sample preparation and examination. S.H. and L.L. performed the assembly and bioinformatical analysis. S.H. and J.J.Y. performed the data analysis. S.H. and X.F.L. gave technical advice and contributed to the study design. S.H. and J.J.Y. wrote the paper. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
